sql_statement_list: SELECT id, delivery_code, activation_date, status, created_at, updated_at FROM progress_tracking WHERE activation_date > NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days' ORDER BY delivery_code DESC;

code_meta_data.code_value:
type ProgressRecord struct {
	ID             string    `gorm:"column:id"`
	DeliveryCode   string    `gorm:"column:delivery_code"`
	ActivationDate time.Time `gorm:"column:activation_date"`
	Status         int       `gorm:"column:status"`
	CreatedAt      time.Time `gorm:"column:created_at"`
	UpdatedAt      time.Time `gorm:"column:updated_at"`
}
const ProgressTrackingTable = "progress_tracking"
var BaseDriver = base.GetInstance().MainDriver()

variants.sql: SELECT * FROM seo_metadata WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIFMIT 10 OFFSET 0;
SELECT * FROM seo_metadata WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET 10;
SELECT * FROM seo_metadata WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT ? OFFSET ?;

code_meta_data.code_value:
type AuctionItem struct {
	ID        uint      `json:"id" gorm:"column:id"`
	Title     string    `json:"title" gorm:"column:title"`
	Keyword   string    `json:"keyword" gorm:"column:keyword"`
	Status    int       `json:"status" gorm:"column:status"`
	StartTime time.Time `json:"start_time" gorm:"column:start_time"`
	EndTime   time.Time `json:"end_time" gorm:"column:end_time"`
	CreatedAt time.Time `json:"created_at" gorm:"column:created_at"`
	UpdatedAt time.Time `json:"updated_at" gorm:"column:updated_at"`
}
const SeoMetadataTable = "seo_metadata"

type ExpenseRecord struct {
	ID          string    `json:"id" gorm:"column:id"`
	Category    string    `json:"category" gorm:"column:category"`
	Amount      float64   `json:"amount" gorm:"column:amount"`
	Description string    `json:"description" gorm:"column:description"`
	RecordDate  time.Time `json:"record_date" gorm:"column:record_date"`
}

variants.scenario: 查询active状态的课程标准并按floor升序排列
variants.sql: SELECT id, name, floor, state, credit FROM curriculum_standards WHERE state = 'active' ORDER BY floor ASC;

code_meta_data.code_value:
type CurriculumTrack struct {
	ID     string `gorm:"column:id;primaryKey"`
	Name   string `gorm:"column:name"`
	Floor  int    `gorm:"column:floor"`
	State  string `gorm:"column:state"`
	Credit int    `gorm:"column:credit"`
}
const CurriculumStandardTable = "curriculum_standards"
const ActiveState = "active"

type CommentType string
const AnalyzeCommentType CommentType = "ANALYZE"

code_meta_data.code_value:
type DepartmentStructure struct {
	ID        string `json:"id" gorm:"column:id"`
	Name      string `json:"name" gorm:"column:name"`
	ParentID  string `json:"parent_id" gorm:"column:parent_id"`
	ExpiredAt int64  `json:"expired_at" gorm:"column:expired_at"`
	CreatedAt int64  `json:"created_at" gorm:"column:created_at"`
	UpdatedAt int64  `json:"updated_at" gorm:"column:updated_at"`
}

type Role struct {
	ID          string `json:"id" gorm:"column:id"`
	Name        string `json:"name" gorm:"column:name"`
	Description string `json:"description" gorm:"column:description"`
	CreatedAt   int64  `json:"created_at" gorm:"column:created_at"`
	UpdatedAt   int64  `json:"updated_at" gorm:"column:updated_at"`
}
const DEPARTMENT_STRUCTURE_TABLE = "department_structure"
const DefaultPageSize = 20

	ID          int     `json:"id" gorm:"column:id"`
	Name        string  `json:"name" gorm:"column:name"`
	Weight      float32 `json:"weight" gorm:"column:weight"`
	Longitude   float64 `json:"longitude" gorm:"column:longitude"`
	SkillLevel  int     `json:"skill_level" gorm:"column:skill_level"`
	CreatedAt   int64   `json:"created_at" gorm:"column:created_at"`
	UpdatedAt   int64   `json:"updated_at" gorm:"column:updated_at"`
}
